body.heading: Connect a wallet
body.content: You'll need to connect or create a digital wallet to buy, sell, trade and store your coins and collectibles.

body.heading: Check for the pop-up from MetaMask
body.content: Follow the prompts in the MetaMask popup to connect

body.heading: Connect with Immutable Passport
body.content: Follow the prompts to connect with Immutable Passport

eth.heading: You'll need to switch to the {{networkName}} network
eth.body: You'll be prompted to switch networks in your wallet.

zkEVM.heading: You’ll be asked to switch to the Immutable zkEVM network
zkEVM.body: Check for the pop-up from MetaMask and 'Approve' to switch. If this is the first time, MetaMask will also ask you to add the network.
zkEVM.bodyWalletConnect: Check for the pop-up from your wallet to switch. If this is the first time, your wallet will also ask you to add the network.

ERROR_VIEW.heading: Something's gone wrong
body: You can try again or contact

heading.swap: Swapping is not available in your region

body.swap: Please refer to <quickswapLink>Quickswap’s</quickswapLink> website for further information.

metamask.heading: Coins and collectibles are native to networks
metamask.body: You can switch networks to add coins or move them from one network to another

passport.heading: Coins and collectibles are native to networks
passport.body1: This network is called Immutable zkEVM. If you have other coins in your Passport and can’t see them here, they might be on another network.

content.title: What would you like to swap?

from.label: From
from.selectorTitle: What would you like to swap from?

to.label: To
to.selectorTitle: What would you like to swap to?

content.heading: Now you'll just need to confirm the transaction
content.body: Follow the prompts in your wallet.

metamask.heading: You'll be asked to set a spending cap for this transaction
metamask.body: Input at least {{amount}} for this transaction and future transactions, then follow the prompts.

passport.heading: You'll be asked to approve a spending cap for this transaction
passport.body: Follow the prompts in your wallet to approve the spending cap.

content.heading: Order in progress
content.body1: You’ll receive an email from Transak when complete. This can take up to 3 mins.
content.body2: You can close this window, the transaction will be reflected in your wallet once complete.

header.title: How would you like to add coins?

onramp.heading: Buy
onramp.caption: With card, Google pay or Apple pay available.

swap.heading: Swap
swap.caption: With the coins I have in my balance.

bridge.heading: Move
bridge.caption: The coins I have in another wallet or network.

advanced.heading: Advanced options
advanced.caption: Perform a fast bridge or CEX deposit.

payWithCard.caption: Buy this items with card instead

fundingRouteSelect.heading: Pay with your
fundingRouteSelect.noRoutesAvailable: Insufficient coin balance. Please proceed with card instead.
fundingRouteSelect.payWithCardInstead: No thanks, I'll pay with card

header.heading: How would you like to pay?

crypto.heading: Coins
crypto.caption: Pay with the coins in your wallet, or buy coins with card
crypto.disabledCaption: Currently not available for this purchase

debit.heading: Debit Card
debit.caption: The recommended way to pay with card.
debit.disabledCaption: Currently working on this. Proceed with Coins & you’ll be guided on how to add them if needed.

credit.heading: Credit Card
credit.caption: Not recommended since transactions may be blocked by your bank.
credit.disabledCaption: Currently working on this. Proceed with Coins & you’ll be guided on how to add them if needed.

topUp.heading: You’ll need to add some coins

subheading.both: Add {{erc20.value}} {{erc20.symbol}} and {{native.value}} {{native.symbol}} to cover this purchase plus gas.
subheading.erc20: Add {{erc20.value}} {{erc20.symbol}} to your balance through one of the following options.
subheading.native: Add {{native.value}} {{native.symbol}} for gas, through one of the following options.

creditCardWarningDrawer.heading: We recommend debit over credit
creditCardWarningDrawer.body: Most banks will charge cash advance fees or block the transaction altogether when using credit card on these types of purchases.

header.heading: Pay with your
header.caption: Using the coins balance in your wallet

SERVICE_BREAKDOWN.description: Sorry, we're unable to process your payment right now. Please try again in a few minutes.

PRODUCT_NOT_FOUND.description: Sorry, this item is no longer available

INSUFFICIENT_STOCK.description: Sorry, the requested quantity is not in stock. Consider buying a smaller quantity.

TRANSAK_FAILED.description: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

WALLET_FAILED.description: Sorry, we're unable to process this right now.

WALLET_REJECTED_NO_FUNDS.description: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

WALLET_REJECTED.description: You'll need to approve the transaction in your wallet to proceed.

WALLET_POPUP_BLOCKED.description: You'll need to allow pop-ups in your browser to proceed.

SMART_CHECKOUT_ERROR.description: Unable to check your wallets balance. Please try again.

SMART_CHECKOUT_EXECUTE_ERROR.description: Sorry, something went wrong while moving funds. Please try again.

DEFAULT_ERROR.description: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again.

INVALID_PARAMETERS.description: Sorry, we're unable to process your order. Missing information from client

WALLET_NETWORK_SELECTION.heading: Where would you like to move funds between?

content.title: How much would you like to move?

from.selectorTitle: What would you like to move?

content.heading: Approve the transaction in your wallet
content.body: Follow the prompts in your wallet popup to confirm.

IN_PROGRESS.heading: Move in progress
IN_PROGRESS.body1: Your funds have been sent, with less than 20 mins remaining until they're received. You can return and view progress by clicking on the rocket icon.

TRANSACTIONS.passportDashboard: View the full transaction history in your

withdrawalPending.withdrawalDelayText: This move has been paused, please return
withdrawalPending.withdrawalReadyText: Action required to receive your coins
withdrawalPending.caption: Paused

notConnected.body: Connect your wallet to view the transactions

passport.body1: Or view completed transactions in your

content.heading: Follow the prompts to receive your coins on
content.body: You’ll be asked to pay a small gas fee to claim your withdrawal.

quickswapFooter.disclaimerText: Quickswap is a third party app. Immutable neither builds, owns, operates or deploys Quickswap. For further info, refer to Quickswap’s website.

passport.heading: Immutable Passport
passport.description: Your gaming wallet to pay with card, manage items & more.

metamask.heading: MetaMask
metamask.description: Digital wallet for accessing blockchain applications and web3.

walletconnect.heading: Other wallets
walletconnect.description: Allows you to connect with any blockchain mobile wallet including MetaMask.

browserwallet.heading: Browser wallets
browserwallet.description: Digital wallet for accessing blockchain applications and web3.

content.heading1: We’ll need you to confirm in your
content.body1: When the MetaMask pop up appears, be sure to

coinSelector.noCoins: You have no available coins to select in your wallet.

content.heading: You'll need more {{token}} for gas
content.body: Your {{token}} balance is too low to cover the gas fee on this move, so you'll need to add more before proceeding.

noImx.heading: You'll need IMX coins to swap
noImx.body: Swap fees are paid in IMX coins, so you'll need to add this before you can swap

insufficientImx.heading: You'll need more IMX coins
insufficientImx.body: In order to cover the fees for the amount specified, you'll need to add more IMX coins

content.body2: to your destination account, or select another account to pay the gas. Your destination account will remain the same.

unableToSwap.heading: Unable to swap this coin
unableToSwap.body: This coin pairing isn't available to swap right now. Try another selection.

manualSwitch.body: You'll need to open your mobile wallet and switch to the {{chain}} network to proceed

controlledSwitch.body: You'll need to switch to the {{chain}} network to proceed

unableToConnect.heading: Unable to connect
unableToConnect.body: Check your wallet and try again, or close and try a different option

changedYourMind.heading: Changed your mind?
changedYourMind.body: Make sure pop ups are enabled and follow the prompts in your wallet to connect
